message: That is a very concerning issue. It's clear that centralised entities can have too much power and control over the cryptocurrency ecosystem, leading to abuse or mistakes that can have a huge negative impact on the whole market. This is why it is so important to create a more decentralized system that is not controlled by a single entity. Decentralized governance models, such as on-chain voting and staking, can help to ensure that users have a say in the decisions of the system and that there is more transparency and accountability. Additionally, users should be given more control over their digital assets and identities. What do you think are some of the other ways to improve the cryptocurrency ecosystem?
speaker: BOSWORTH
